# validationMode

**Instance Property**

The validation mode of the mobile document request.

## Declaration

```swift
var validationMode: MobileDriversLicenseDisplayRequest.Options.ValidationMode
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/MobileDriversLicenseDisplayRequest/Options-swift.struct/ValidationMode-swift.struct/check].
